metaData.title: Van Insurance | Cheap Van Insurance Quote - Vanarama
metaData.name: Get Your Low Cost Vehicle Insurance Quote
metaData.metaDescription: Switch from your current insurance provider to Vanarama Insurance & we'll give you ¬£100. You'll get the correct insurance cover at the cheapest possible price.

featured1.body:
At Vanarama, our policies are built specifically for leasing, so you know your're getting the best deal for you. 

__FREEZE Your Premium For Up To 5 Years__
Beat the annual premium price rise with multi-year insurance

__75% Of Our Customers Renew With Us__
Because our insurance policies are built to suit your needs

__No Hidden Charges__
Pay for the vehicle cover you NEED, not what you can get!
featured1.title: Why Choose Vanarama For Your Insurance?

featured2.body:
### What You Need To Know

From how to get a quote right through to your no claims bonus, we've tried to make everything about van insurance a little clearer by putting together answers to some of our most frequently asked questions.

[Read Our FAQs](/van-insurance/faq.html "Read Our FAQs")
featured2.title: Our Van Insurance Services

cards.name: Insurance Types
cards.description: At Vanarama we offer a wide range of insurance policies to suit your needs. Whether you want short-term 7-day driveaway insurance or to cover your whole lease, we've removed all the hassle and extra costs you'd usually expect when insuring your vehicle. You can compare insurance prices and purchase policies online, insure your tools and even freeze your premium for up to 5 years... all in one place!

cards.name: Multi-Year Insurance
cards.title: Multi-Year Insurance
cards.body: Protect yourself against future insurance price increases

cards.name: Finance GAP Insurance
cards.title: Finance GAP Insurance
cards.body: Extra protection should the worst happen

cards.name: Tools In Transit Insurance
cards.title: Tools in Transit Insurance
cards.body: Get up to £3k's worth of tools cover for only £75 per year

cards.title: Do I Need Insurance For A Leased Car?

cards.name: The Real Cost Of Having Your Van Or Tools Stolen
cards.title: The Real Cost Of Having Your Van Or Tools Stolen
cards.body: It's something we all dread happening & you'll want to know you've got a backup.
